justification: The SD3 questionnaire was used to assess Machiavellianism, psychopathy, and narcissism as part of the dark triad of personality traits in the study.
Social value orientation was measured using the SVO Slider Measure, which reflects an individual's preference for resource allocation between self and others.

Participants' willingness to share others' personal information was measured through a custom-designed task where they were asked to provide the names and phone numbers of up to five other individuals.
